verbose_text: XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR Whereas IRE1alpha / XBP1 signaling primarily mediates adaptive responses to reestablish ER function, this protective signal can be prematurely attenuated during severe or prolonged ER stress resulting in upregulation of proapoptotic CHOP and cell death.
evidence: XBP1 signaling primarily mediates adaptive responses to reestablish ER
